languages.text: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next turn.
languages.original_text: Мгновенно предоставляет +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} и дает 2 заряда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} Рассечение, но уменьшает значения {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} на 15 до начала следующего хода персонажа, воспользовавшегося стимулятором.

traits.locale_text: Grants +6 bonus to MP and -15 penalty to WS, BS, PER for 1 rounds.
Grants a +6 bonus to MP and inflicts a −15 penalty to WS, BS, PER for 1 round.
Grants a +6 bonus to MP and inflicts a −15 penalty to WS, BS, PER for 1 round.

languages.text: Мгновенно предоставляет +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} и дает 2 заряда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} Рассечение, но уменьшает значения {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} на 15 до начала следующего хода персонажа, воспользовавшегося стимулятором.
languages.original_text: Grants a +6 bonus to MP and inflicts a −15 penalty to WS, BS, PER for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Дает +6 ОП и накладывает штраф −15 к Ближнему Бою, Дальнему Бою и Восприятию на 1 раунд.
Дает +6 ОП и накладывает штраф −15 к Ближнему Бою, Дальнему Бою и Восприятию на 1 раунд.

languages.text: 立刻额外获得6点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，获得2次快刀一闪{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}使用次数，但{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}降低15点，效果持续至使用者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。
languages.original_text: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}额外获得6点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}降低15点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}

languages.text: Aumenta inmediatamente los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} en +6 y otorga 2 cargas de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Tajo, pero reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} , y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} en −15 hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del usuario.
languages.original_text: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Otorga una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +6 a los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} e inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} -15 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 瞬時に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が+6増加して、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}スラッシュが2チャージ分付与されるが、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が開始するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が−15減少する。
languages.original_text: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}に+6の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与え、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}に-15の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} sofort um +6 und gewährt 2 Ladungen der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Schlitzen, reduziert aber {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Nutzers um −15.
languages.original_text: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und verursacht −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Augmente instantanément les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} de +6 et confère 2 charges de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Lacérer, mais réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de 15 jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Confère un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} de +6 et inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} de -15 pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
